title: I'm overwhelmed with exam stress and can...

history.text: Hello! I am Phoenix, your mental health chatbot. How can I help you today?
I'm overwhelmed with exam stress and can't focus.

I hear you. Exam stress is tough.  Let's try some calming techniques.  Deep breaths can help.  Try focusing on one task at a time, breaking down big assignments into smaller, manageable steps.  Remember, you've got this!  If you feel consistently overwhelmed, consider reaching out to a counselor or academic advisor for support.
i dont think i can do this anymore

I hear you saying things feel overwhelming right now.  It sounds incredibly tough.  Can you tell me a little more about what's making you feel this way?  Even if it's just a small detail, sharing can help.  Remember, you don't have to go through this alone.
